devdoc.author: Alessandro Rossi (ENG), 2023
devdoc.details: Notarization of monitoring data into the Blockchain through the hash of their dump at each timeslot.

addMeasurement(address,uint256,string,by.details: Force the notarization of a monitoring data hash for a given data provider at a given unchecked timestamp

certify(string,string).details: Calculate and notarize the hash of monitoring data, normalizing the current timestamp

check(uint256,string).details: Calculate and verify if a monitoring data hash has been notarized, normalizing the given timestamp

encodeHash(string).details: Calculate the monitoring data hash with Keccak 256 (SHA-3) algorithm

getLabel(uint256).details: Get the metadata attached to the monitoring data notarized at a given timestamp

getMeasurement(address,uint256).details: Get the Measurement notarized for a given data provider at a given timestamp

normalize(uint256).details: Set the timestamp to the preceding timeslot (e.g., 01:23:45 --> 01:15:00, if timeslot=15 min)

notarize(uint256,string,bytes32).details: Register a hash into the blockchain. at a given normalized unused timestamp

verify(uint256,bytes32).details: Prove if a monitoring data hash has been notarized at a given used timestamp
